author: SkinnyTaste
name: Lemony Hearts of Palm and Avocado Salad

ingredients.notes: sliced 1/4 inch thick on an angle, from 14 ounce can

instructions: Place onions in a medium bowl, season with 1/4 teaspoon Kosher salt, set aside while you prep the remaining ingredients. Add the hearts of palm and tomato to the onions, add fresh 2 tablespoons fresh lemon juice, drizzle with 2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil, 1/4 teaspoon salt and fresh black pepper. Place arugula in a large salad bowl, and arrange the avocado. Pour everything over the salad and serve right away, toss before serving.
